item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ancient Sumerians Created the First Writing System (19 points | 6 comments)

13. How to build 99.999% uptime payment systems (10 points | 4 comments)

25. We can mine asteroids for space food (151 points | 188 comments)
26. Sombrero Galaxy dazzles in new James Webb image (90 points | 40 comments)
27. FQL: A KV Query Language (58 points | 8 comments)
28. I Stopped Using Kubernetes. Our DevOps Team Is Happier Than Ever (155 points | 130 comments)
29. D-Link says it won't patch 60k older modems (224 points | 132 comments)
30. Henry James and H.G. Wells (1958) (60 points | 34 comments)
